AT.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
AT.description: Stürze dich in diesem Actionspiel für 4 Spieler mit deinem liebsten rosa Plüschball in den Kampf! Spiele im Team oder allein und kämpfe dich durch neue und klassische Kirby™-Arenen. Wähle zwischen mächtigen Fähigkeiten wie Schwert, Ninja, Hammer und mehr, und verbessere dein Kampfgeschick bis ans Limit! Dieses Standalone-Spiel basiert auf dem wilden Kampfmodus aus Kirby: Triple Deluxe, enthält aber auch neue und erweiterte Gameplay-Features, einen Team-Modus, neue Arenen und mehr. Schließe dich mit einem Freund zusammen und feuer die neue mächtige Team-Kanone ab, um deinen Feinden gewaltigen Schaden zuzufügen! Erhalte seltene Fähigkeiten-Hüte, indem du Kracko und die Armee von König Dedede im Einzelspielermodus besiegst. Besitzer von Kirby: Triple Deluxe haben außerdem Zugriff auf zwei zusätzliche Fähigkeiten und eine exklusive Arena – Waddle-Dee-Gleise! Diese Software unterstützt bis zu 4 Spieler für Lokales Spiel und Download-Spiel.

AU.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
AU.description: Fight it out with your favorite pink puffball in a fierce four-player battle action game! Team up or go solo as you battle in new and classic Kirby™ arenas. Choose from powerful copy abilities like Sword, Ninja, Hammer and more as you take your fighting skills to the limit! Based on the wild battle mode introduced in Kirby: Triple Deluxe, this standalone game contains expanded gameplay features, the ability to play as a team, new arenas and more. Join up with a friend and fire the powerful new Team Cannon to blast opponents with mega-damage! Earn rare copy ability hats for defeating Kracko and the King Dedede army in the single-player gauntlet. Owners of Kirby: Triple Deluxe can also access two bonus copy abilities plus an exclusive arena – Waddle Dee Train Tracks! This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play.

BG.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
BG.description: Fight it out with your favorite pink puffball in a fierce four-player battle action game! Team up or go solo as you battle in new and classic Kirby™ arenas. Choose from powerful copy abilities like Sword, Ninja, Hammer and more as you take your fighting skills to the limit! Based on the wild battle mode introduced in Kirby: Triple Deluxe, this standalone game contains expanded gameplay features, the ability to play as a team, new arenas and more. Join up with a friend and fire the powerful new Team Cannon to blast opponents with mega-damage! Owners of Kirby: Triple Deluxe can also access two bonus copy abilities plus an exclusive arena – Waddle Dee Train Tracks! This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play.

BE.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
BE.description: Incarnez votre boule rose favorite dans un jeu d'action et de combat pour 4 joueurs! Jouez en équipe ou en solo pour combattre dans les arènes Kirby™ classiques et inédits. Choisissez un des pouvoirs puissants comme Épée, Ninja, Marteau, et plus encore, alors que vos talents pour le combat seront mis à rude épreuve! Basé sur les Combats Kirby présents dans le jeu Kirby: Triple Deluxe, ce jeu distinct comprend des fonctions plus poussées, la possibilité de jouer en équipe, de nouveaux rings, et plus encore! Rejoignez un allié et tirez avec le puissant canon coop pour infliger d'énormes dégâts à vos ennemis! Dans ce défi en solo, gagnez des accessoires rares en battant Kracko et l'armée du Roi DaDiDou. Les propriétaires de Kirby: Triple Deluxe peuvent également accéder à deux pouvoirs bonus ainsi qu'une arène exclusive: le Train Waddle Dee! Ce logiciel peut accueillir jusqu'à 4 joueurs dans le mode multijoueur local et le mode téléchargement.

ES.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
ES.description: ¡Pelea con tu personaje rosa favorito en fieras batallas de cuatro jugadores en este juego de acción! Únete a un grupo o aventúrate solo mientras peleas en nuevos y clásicos escenarios de Kirby. ¡Elige entre poderosas habilidades como Espada, Ninja, Martillo y más mientras llevas tus habilidades de lucha al límite! Basado en el modo de batalla salvaje introducido en Kirby: Triple Deluxe, este juego contiene más funciones de juego, la habilidad de jugar en equipo, nuevos escenarios y mucho más. ¡Únete a un amigo y ataca con el nuevo y poderoso cañón equipo para causar gran daño a tus oponentes! Gana sombreros de habilidades especiales por vencer a Kracko y a la armada del rey Dedede en el modo para un jugador. ¡Los usuarios de Kirby: Triple Deluxe tendrán acceso a dos habilidades extra además de un escenario exclusivo: ¡las Vías del tren de Waddle Dee! Este programa permite la participación de hasta 4 jugadores tanto en el modo de juego local como en el modo descarga.

IT.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
IT.description: Preparati a fare a botte con il tuo batuffolo rosa preferito in un rissoso gioco d'azione per quattro amici! Combatti in compagnia o da solo in arene classiche e inedite di Kirby™. Scegli tra potenti abilità come la spada, il ninja, il martello e tante altre ancora per portare la lotta al limite! Ispirato ai furiosi combattimenti introdotti con Kirby: Triple Deluxe, questo speciale gioco ti offre funzioni esclusive, la possibilità di giocare in squadra, arene inedite e tante altre novità. Fatti aiutare da un amico per sferrare un mega-attacco con il cannone combinato. Oppure ottieni rarissimi cappelli che ti daranno le abilità per sconfiggere Kracko e l'intero esercito di King Dedede nella modalità per giocatore singolo. Se possiedi già Kirby: Triple Deluxe, puoi ottenere due ulteriori abilità e un'arena esclusiva: i Binari di Waddle Dee Treno! Questo software supporta fino a 4 giocatori sia per la modalità wireless, sia per la modalità download.

NO.description: Fight it out with your favorite pink puffball in a fierce four-player battle action game! Team up or go solo as you battle in new and classic Kirby™ arenas. NL.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
NL.description: Neem controle over je favoriete roze plofkop en lever strijd in deze zinderende actiegame voor vier spelers! Vorm een team of zoek in je eentje de confrontatie op in gloednieuwe en klassieke Kirby-arena’s. Kies uit krachtige kopieervaardigheden en bewapen jezelf met een zwaard of een hamer, of vermom jezelf als een ninja. Hoe meer je vecht en hoe beter je wordt, hoe meer kopieervaardigheden beschikbaar komen! Deze losse versie is gebaseerd op de minigame te vinden in Kirby: Triple Deluxe en biedt onder andere uitgebreidere gameplay, de mogelijkheid tot het vormen van een team en nieuwe arena’s. De Team Cannon-aanval, die ontzettend veel schade toebrengt aan tegenstanders, is nieuw toegevoegd en enkel te gebruiken als je een team hebt gevormd! Verdien de zeldzame variant van kopieervaardigheden door Kracko en King Dedede te verslaan in de spelstand voor een speler. Eigenaars van Kirby: Triple Deluxe krijgen toegang tot twee bonus kopieervaardigheden en een exclusieve arena: Waddle Dee Train Tracks! Deze software ondersteunt tot maximaal 4 spelers via Local Play en Download Play.

NZ.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
NZ.description: Fight it out with your favorite pink puffball in a fierce four-player battle action game! Team up or go solo as you battle in new and classic Kirby™ arenas. Choose from powerful copy abilities like Sword, Ninja, Hammer and more as you take your fighting skills to the limit! PT.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
PT.description: Luta com o teu personagem cor-de-rosa e fofinho preferido num jogo de ação com batalhas intensas para 4 jogadores! Joga em equipa ou sozinho enquanto lutas em novas e clássicas arenas de Kirby™. Escolhe entre poderosas habilidades que podem ser copiadas como Sword, Ninja, Hammer e mais, enquanto levas as tuas aptidões de luta ao limite! "Baseado no modo de batalha frenético introduzido em Kirby: Triple Deluxe, este jogo independente contém funções de jogo melhoradas, novas arenas, a possibilidade de jogar em equipas e mais. Junta-te a um amigo e ataca o poderoso novo Team Cannon para acabar com rivais causando-lhes grandes danos! Consegue chapéus raros que copiam habilidades para derrotar Kracko e o exército de King Dedede no modo para um jogador." Jogadores que possuem o jogo Kirby: Triple Deluxe podem também ter acesso a duas habilidades de bónus e a uma arena exclusiva – Waddle Dee Train Tracks! Esta aplicação suporta até 4 jogadores no modo de jogo local e no modo de download.

RU.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
RU.description: Сражайтесь бок о бок с розовым шариком в беспощадной битве для 4 игроков! Объединяйтесь с другими игроками или боритесь в одиночку как на знакомых, так и на совершенно новых Кирби™-аренах. Выберите способности для копирования, например Sword (Кирби-Меч), Ninja (Кирби-Ниндзя) или Hammer (Кирби-Молоток). Покажите, на что вы способны! Эта отдельная версия создана по мотивами режима battle mode (битвы) игры Kirby: Triple Deluxe. Откройте для себя расширенные характеристики игрового процесса, возможность играть в команде, новые арены и многое другое! Объединитесь с другом и нанесите врагам суперурон, обстреляв их из новой мощной пушки Team Cannon. Играя в одиночку, вы сможете заполучить редкие шапки со способностями, а также одолеть могущественного Kracko и даже армию Короля Дидиди. Владельцы игры Kirby: Triple Deluxe также получат 2 призовые способности и эксклюзивную арену — Waddle Dee Train Tracks! Данная программа поддерживает до 4 игроков в режиме локальной игры или загружаемой игры.

Join up with a friend and fire the powerful new Team Cannon to blast opponents with mega-damage! Owners of Kirby: Triple Deluxe can also access two bonus copy abilities plus an exclusive arena – Waddle Dee Train Tracks! This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play.

SK.name: Kirby Fighters™ Deluxe
SK.description: Fight it out with your favorite pink puffball in a fierce four-player battle action game! Team up or go solo as you battle in new and classic Kirby™ arenas. Choose from powerful copy abilities like Sword, Ninja, Hammer and more as you take your fighting skills to the limit! Based on the wild battle mode introduced in Kirby: Triple Deluxe, this standalone game contains expanded gameplay features, the ability to play as a team, new arenas and more. Join up with a friend and fire the powerful new Team Cannon to blast opponents with mega-damage! Earn rare copy ability hats for defeating Kracko and the King Dedede army in the single-player gauntlet. Owners of Kirby: Triple Deluxe can also access two bonus copy abilities plus an exclusive arena – Waddle Dee Train Tracks! This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play.
